CustomTileSplitter.description: Split images or latent representations into overlapping tiles for high-resolution processing. Supports flexible grid configuration with automatic or manual row/column settings.

tile_size.name: Tile Size
tile_size.tooltip: Base size for each tile (square). When rows/columns are specified, this becomes a target size that may be adjusted for grid fitting.

overlap.name: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Pixel overlap between adjacent tiles. Essential for seamless blending during merging.

rows.name: Rows
rows.tooltip: Number of vertical divisions. Set to 0 for automatic calculation based on tile size.

columns.name: Columns
columns.tooltip: Number of horizontal divisions. Set to 0 for automatic calculation based on tile size.

normalize.name: Normalize to Multiples
normalize.tooltip: Pad dimensions to multiples of 64 (images) or 8 (latent) for compatibility with AI models.

image.name: Image (Optional)
image.tooltip: Input image to be split. Can use either image or latent, but not both required.

latent.name: Latent (Optional)
latent.tooltip: Input latent representation to be split. Can use either image or latent, but not both required.

0.name: Tile Configuration
0.tooltip: Structured configuration data containing tile layout, coordinates, and dimensions for use with the Tile Merger.

1.name: Image Tiles (Batch)
1.tooltip: All extracted tiles concatenated into a single batch tensor for parallel processing.

2.name: Image Tiles (List)
2.tooltip: Each tile as a separate list element, maintaining original positional relationships.

3.name: Latent Tiles (Batch)
3.tooltip: Latent representations of tiles concatenated into a batch tensor.

4.name: Latent Tiles (List)
4.tooltip: Individual latent tiles in a list structure preserving positional order.

CustomTileMerger.description: Reassemble processed tiles into a seamless full image using advanced blending algorithms, seam optimization, and color correction techniques.

tile_config.name: Tile Configuration
tile_config.tooltip: Tile layout configuration generated by the Tile Splitter node.

blend_mode.name: Blending Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Algorithm for blending overlapping tile regions. 
linear: Linear gradient (simple transition)
gaussian: Gaussian blur (classic blending)
multi_band: Multi-band blending (optimal effect)
none: No blending (fastest)

blend_strength.name: Blend Strength
blend_strength.tooltip: Intensity of blending effect. Higher values create smoother transitions.

seam_mode.name: Seam Placement
seam_mode.tooltip:
Method for determining optimal seam lines in overlap regions.
optimal: Calculate the optimal stitching seam (slow but high quality)
middle: Center line (simple and fast)

histogram_matching.name: Histogram Matching
histogram_matching.tooltip: Adjust color distribution of each tile to match neighbors, reducing color inconsistencies.

seam_search_radius.name: Seam Search Radius
seam_search_radius.tooltip: Restrict seam search to pixels within this distance from center. 0 allows full search.

processed_tiles_image.name: Processed Image Tiles
processed_tiles_image.tooltip: List of enhanced/processed image tiles ready for merging.

processed_tiles_latent.name: Processed Latent Tiles
processed_tiles_latent.tooltip: List of processed latent representations for merging.

0.name: Merged Image
0.tooltip: Final reconstructed image with seamless tile integration.

1.name: Merged Latent
1.tooltip: Reconstructed latent representation from merged tiles.
